## ChainProCluster.rebalanceCluster() method

Rebalances a cluster

**Signature:**

```typescript
rebalanceCluster(network: TokenNetwork, token: string): Promise<string>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

TokenNetwork

The network to rebalance on

token


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The token to rebalance with, "0xEeeeeEeeeEeEeeEeEeEeeEEEeeeeEeeeeeeeEEeE" for EVM chains and "So11111111111111111111111111111111111111112" for Solana


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;string&gt;

An intent ID that can be tracked for the status of this intent  When funding a single account out of many for a multi-wallet cluster, executing a rebalance balances the amount of tokens across all clusters so that they are roughly equal, with some jittering.
